Package arcade.core.env.component

Interface Component

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PatchComponentCycle, PatchComponentDegrade, PatchComponentPulse, PatchComponentRemodel, PatchComponentSites, PatchComponentSitesGraph, PatchComponentSitesGraphRect, PatchComponentSitesGraphRect.Complex, PatchComponentSitesGraphRect.Simple, PatchComponentSitesGraphTri, PatchComponentSitesGraphTri.Complex, PatchComponentSitesGraphTri.Simple, PatchComponentSitesPattern, PatchComponentSitesPatternRect, PatchComponentSitesPatternTri, PatchComponentSitesSource
    public interface Component
extends sim.engine.Steppable
    A Component object is a steppable that interacts with the environment.

    Component objects represent any entity that interacts with the environment. They can be used for:

    • changing one or more layers or layer operations such as adding a drug pulse or time delayed nutrient variation or introduction of a drug
    • representing physical entities within the environment such as capillary beds or matrix scaffolding

    Component objects can affect Lattice layers or layer Operation instances. Component objects are analogs to Action for steppables that affect the environment.
